content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Furnace at position (60.0, -60.0)
Consists of a Furnace entity at position (60.0, -60.0) with fuel {'coal': 40} and status EntityStatus.NO_INGREDIENTS.

### Inserter 1 at position (60.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter entity at position (60.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 47} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION.

### Inserter 2 at position (61.5, -61.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter entity at position (61.5, -61.5) with fuel {'coal': 19} and status EntityStatus.WAITING_FOR_SOURCE_ITEMS.

### Inserter 3 at position (62.5, -60.5)
Consists of a BurnerInserter entity at position (62.5, -60.5) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Chest at position (62.5, -61.5)
Consists of a Chest entity at position (62.5, -61.5) with an empty inventory.

### Offshore Pump at position (107.5, -33.5)
Consists of an OffshorePump entity at position (107.5, -33.5) with a fluid box containing water.

### Boiler at position (111.5, -32.0)
Consists of a Boiler entity at position (111.5, -32.0) with no fuel and status EntityStatus.NO_FUEL.

### Steam Engine at position (117.5, -30.5)
Consists of a Generator entity at position (117.5, -30.5) with status EntityStatus.NOT_CONNECTED.

### Pipe Group at position (107.5, -34.5)
Consists of a PipeGroup entity at position (107.5, -34.5) with a fluid system containing water.

### Pipe Group at position (111.5, -33.5)
Consists of a PipeGroup entity at position (111.5, -33.5) with an empty fluid system.

### Electricity Group at position (119.5, -30.5)
Consists of an ElectricityGroup entity at position (119.5, -30.5) with a voltage of 0.

### Belt at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of a Belt entity at position (63.5, -53.5) with direction Direction.UP.

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when connecting pipes: Ensure that the entities are close enough to connect and that there are no obstacles in the way.
* Errors when placing entities: Ensure that the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place a new entity.
* Errors when using inserters: Ensure that the inserter has fuel and that the destination entity has space to receive items.
* Errors when using boilers: Ensure that the boiler has fuel and that the steam output point is connected to a steam engine.
* Errors when using steam engines: Ensure that the steam engine has a fluid input and that the fluid system is connected to a boiler.

### NAMESPACE
* Important variables:
	+ `transport-belt`: 8
	+ `small-electric-pole`: 1
	+ `pipe`: 20
	+ `stone-furnace`: 1
	+ `wood`: 7
	+ `iron-ore`: 6
	+ `copper-ore`: 20
	+ `iron-plate`: 613
	+ `copper-plate`: 5
	+ `copper-cable`: 2
	+ `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
* Utility functions:
	+ `connect_entities`: Connects two entities with a pipe. Returns an error if the entities are not close enough or if there are obstacles in the way.
